pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Passive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Unstable Ant Nests.$(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Teleport to $(6)Danger Isles$().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() It doesn’t drop anything, but killing it suggests that you yourself are unstable. Hopefully you feel bad now.

pages.title: Description
pages.text: The Unstable Ant is a little creature who wanders the plains of the world barely knowing who or what it is. Due to its’ forgetful and confused nature, interacting with the ant will take you to a place where danger is most prevalent. So, make sure you’re ready before messing with this ant.
